data.md:MetaData: Meteorological observations during ELISABETH cruise from Nederland to St. George Delmina started at 1837-11-08
Ship: Elisabeth, Voyage: Nederland - St George D'Elmina, 1st Observer: F. Fokkens (Kapitein)
CLIWOC: A Climatological Database for the World's Oceans 1750–1854 (and 10 more publications about CLIWOC results in the same volume)
